about.description:
Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium,

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain. These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will frequently occur that pleasures have to be repudiated and annoyances accepted. The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.

steps.title: Doing Business On WoWeBazaar Is Really Easy

step_1.title: List your products & Get support service provider
step_1.description: Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Sell under your own private label or sell an existing brand. Get your documentation & cataloging done with ease from our Professional Services network.

step_2.title: Receive Orders & Schedule A Pickup
step_2.description: Once listed, your products will be available to millions of users.Get orders and manage your online business via our Seller Panel and Seller Zone Mobile App.

step_3.title: Receive Quick Payment & Grow Your Business
step_3.description: Receive quick and hassle-free payments in your account once your orders are fulfilled. Expand your business with low interest & collateral-free loans.

start_selling.title: Start Selling
start_selling.description: WoWeBazaar marketplace is Nepalâ€™s leading platform for selling online. Be it a manufacturer, vendor or supplier, simply sell your products online on WoWeBazaar and become a top ecommerce player with minimum investment. Through a team of experts offering exclusive seller workshops, training, seller support and convenient seller portal, WoWeBazaar focuses on educating and empowering sellers across Nepal. Selling on WoWeBazaar.com is easy and absolutely free. All you need is to register, list your catalogue and start selling your products.

general.site_tagline: WoWeBazaar connects people and businesses with fast two-way cargo between Nepal and Cyprus, plus expanding routes to the UK, Japan, Qatar and Dubai. We also offer affordable flight tickets and an online marketplace serving Nepal.

product.shipping_and_return:
Shipping and Returns are integral parts of your shopping experience, and we aim to make them as smooth as possible. We prioritize efficient shipping, striving to deliver your orders promptly within the estimated delivery window, typically ranging from 5 to 7 days. We understand that sometimes your purchase may not meet your expectations, so we offer a straightforward return policy. If you find yourself unsatisfied with your order, eligible items can be returned within 30 days of purchase, ensuring you have ample time to make a decision. Our commitment is to ensure your satisfaction and convenience throughout your shopping journey with us, and we're here to assist you every step of the way.

Our Shipping Commitment:

  • Timely and reliable delivery within 5-7 days.

  • Real-time tracking for your orders.

  • Exceptional packaging to ensure your items arrive in perfect condition.

Our Hassle-Free Returns:

  • Eligible items can be returned within 30 days.

  • Easy return initiation through our website.

  • Prompt processing of returns for a hassle-free experience.

  •  

We understand that your shopping needs may vary, and we are here to accommodate them while providing exceptional service.

about.description: WoWeBazaar is your trusted cross-border partner. We connect people and businesses through lightning-fast cargo services between Nepal and Cyprus, expanding rapidly to the UK, Japan, Qatar, and Dubai. Beyond logistics, we offer competitive flight ticketing and a thriving online ecommerce marketplace.
